name: youtube-blog-readers
description: YouTube for Blog Readers extension with channel blocking

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run zip
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run update-manifest
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run update-manifest
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run update-manifest
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Upload dist/youtube-blog-readers-v'$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version")'.zip to Chrome Web Store'
